ban_snipe_tooltip: You've selected a champion one of your teammates wants to play. If you ban it, they will have to pick another champion.
boost_modal_message: For {{price}} RP your team will receive:
boost_modal_list_item_2: Bonus Blue Essence applied to this game
boost_you_unlocked_message_noskins: You purchased a boost for your team! You'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_summoner_unlocked_message_noskins: {{summonerName}} unlocked a boost for your team! You'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_you_unlocked_message_single: You purchased a boost for your team! {{skinName}} has been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_summoner_unlocked_message_single: {{summonerName}} unlocked a boost for your team! {{skinName}} has been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_you_unlocked_message_double: You purchased a boost for your team! {{skinName1}} and {{skinName2}} have been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_summoner_unlocked_message_double: {{summonerName}} unlocked a boost for your team! {{skinName1}} and {{skinName2}} have been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_you_unlocked_message_multi: You purchased a boost for your team! {{skinNameList}}, and {{lastSkinName}} have been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_summoner_unlocked_message_multi: {{summonerName}} unlocked a boost for your team! {{skinNameList}}, and {{lastSkinName}} have been unlocked for this game and you'll earn {{ip}} Blue Essence!
boost_success_general_chat_message_self: You unlocked a Battle Boost for your team!
boost_success_general_chat_message_other: {{summonerName}} unlocked a Battle Boost for your team!
boost_success_ip_chat_message: You'll earn {{amount}} Blue Essence for this game!
boost_success_skin_chat_message_single: {{skinName}} has been unlocked for you this game.
boost_success_skin_chat_message_double: {{skinName1}} and {{skinName2}} have been unlocked for you this game.
boost_success_skin_chat_message_multi: {{skinNameList}}, and {{lastSkinName}} have been unlocked for you this game.
boost_tooltip_message: Click to purchase a boost for your team that unlocks {{boostableSkinCount}} skin(s) for their champion and gives bonus Blue Essence this game.
boost_tooltip_insufficient_rp: You don't have enough RP to purchase a Battle Boost.
bravery-champion-select-tooltip:
BRAVERY

You get a bonus Stats Anvil and 2 additional rerolls to start the game.
Your champion will be revealed in the loading screen.
crowd-favorite-select-tooltip:
CROWD FAVORITES

You get a bonus Stats Anvil to start the game.
dodge_body: If you exit the game now, you'll receive a time penalty that will stop either you or your team from entering any match made game! If you are in a League series, dodging will end your series if this is the determining loss. Are you sure you want to leave?
clash_dodge_body: If you exit the game now, picks and bans will continue, and you may be assigned a random champion for this tournament match. Are you sure you want to leave?
disconnect_notification_body: You've lost your connection to champ select. Please keep attempting selections as we try to recover it.
disconnect_should_exit_dialog_body: Your connection could not be recovered. Please exit the client and queue up again.
emotes_edit_button_disabled: Emote selection is disabled until you lock in your pick.
error_could_not_get_skin_info: There was a error getting skin information.
error_could_not_lock_in: There was an error locking in your champion.
error_could_not_purchase_boost: There was an error purchasing the Battle Boost.
error_could_not_purchase_skin: There was an error purchasing this skin.
error_could_not_request_swap: There was an error requesting that swap.
error_could_not_request_trade: There was an error requesting that trade.
error_could_not_reroll: There was an error rerolling your champion.
error_could_not_save_favorite: There was an error saving your favorite.
error_could_not_save_masteries: There was an error saving your masteries.
error_could_not_save_runes: There was an error saving your runes.
error_could_not_select_champion: There was a problem selecting your champion.
error_could_not_set_perks_page: There was an error setting your runes page.
error_could_not_set_skin: There was a problem setting your skin.
error_could_not_set_spells: There was an error setting your summoner spells.
error_could_not_set_ward_skin: There was an error setting your ward skin.
error_could_not_trade: There was an error with that trade.
error_could_not_swap: There was an error with that pick order swap.
error_perks_page_contains_invalid_choice: {{page_name}}' contains invalid choices. Please verify the page.
error_network_try_again: We couldn't reach the server, so please check your network connection and try again.
error_could_not_swap_bench_champion: The champion you tried to switch with is no longer available.
filter_by_position_top: Show the most commonly-picked champions at Top during the previous patch.
filter_by_position_jungle: Show the most commonly-picked champions at Jungle during the previous patch.
filter_by_position_middle: Show the most commonly-picked champions at Middle during the previous patch.
filter_by_position_bottom: Show the most commonly-picked champions at Bottom during the previous patch.
filter_by_position_support: Show the most commonly-picked champions at Support during the previous patch.
reroll_tooltip[zero]: You have no champion rerolls available.
runes_existing_player_tutorial_tooltip: Runes have been reforged! Select or create a page to use in game.
runes_newly_unlocked_tooltip: Runes now unlocked! Choose a page you'd like to play with.
rune_recommender_disabled_no_champion_se: Please select or lock in a champion to view.
rune_recommender_tutorial_tooltip: We've now added a Rune Recommendation tool. Click to view.
skin_purchase_check_box_disclaimer_link_: I have read the essential purchase notices
skin_purchase_unavailable_tooltip: This skin is currently not available for purchase
skin_purchase_available_notification_mes: You can now purchase skins in champion select.
smite_assignment_message: We swapped a summoner spell to SMITE because you've been assigned jungle.
subset-champions-blessing-bench-body: A third champion card may appear, with the chances increasing for each champion you own.
subset-champions-blessing-champ-name-too: This champion came from a blessing.
ten_ban_announcement_tooltip_body: We've updated champ select to bring 10 bans to regular play. After declaring pick intent, everyone on your team will have an opportunity to ban a champion at the same time.
ward_skin_button_disabled_not_done_picki: Ward skin selection is disabled until you have locked in a champion.
champion_bench_item_tooltip: Click to switch your selection to {{championName}}.
champion_bench_label_tooltip: Re-rolled champions show up here. Click one to switch your selection.
system_message_starting_soon: [System Notification] Your match will start soon. Please wait as we load up your game. This process should not take more than a few minutes.
csr_report_submitted: Thank you, your report for {{name}} has been submitted. The game will continue.
ban_intent_modal_description: {{name}} has declared intent to play the champion you are about to ban. Do you want to ban anyway?
ban_intent_modal_description_self: You have declared intent to play the champion you are about to ban. Do you want to ban anyway?
ban_intent_blocked_sniping_teammate: Your teammate has signaled that they want to play this champion.
position_swap_new_tooltip: Click here to swap positions with another player.
pick_order_swap_new_tooltip: Click here to swap pick order with another player.
champ_trade_new_tooltip: Click here to swap champions with another player.
pregame_swap_canceled: The swap request has been cancelled
pregame_swap_error: The swap could not be requested. Please try again
pregame_swap_requested: {{actor}} wants to swap pick order with you
pregame_swap_waiting: Waiting for {{actor}} to respond to your swap request...
swap_waiting$html: Waiting for a response to your swap request for {{swap}}
swap_waiting_pick_order$html: Waiting for a response to your swap request for pick {{swap}}
swap_busy: This player is swapping with someone else
error_swap_failed: The swap could not be completed
swap_jungle_hover_tooltip_desc$html:
The jungle role requires you to take Smite as one of your spells.

Use the spell selector to change its slot.
swap_new_tooltip: You can swap roles with your teammates throughout champion select
swap_jungle_new_tooltip: Junglers must take Smite as one of their spells. Swap the hotkey using the spell selector UI.
